content: huggable booties keep those tiny feet warm and kicking in these quick-knit booties knit flat with a seam up the back you probably have enough dk yarn in your stash makes a welcome and personal baby shower gift sizes 1 month 3 months bootie foot length 1 month 9 cm 3 5 3 months 10 cm 4 materials needles and notions 3 25mm us 3 needles or size needed to obtain gauge 2 75mm us 2 needles yarn needle yarn 50 60 metres 55 66 yards suggested yarn any dk yarn will fit the measurements the grey set pictured above were knitted in worsted weight which is slightly roomier but also creates a denser fabric gauge 20 sts stocking stitch 10cm 4 on 3 25mm needles or size needed to obtain gauge page 1 ©hushimcounting 2022 find hushimcounting designs at @hushimcounting on instagram at https //www ravelry com/stores/hushimcounting- designs or at https //www lovecrafts com instructions cast on 31 35 sts with 3 25mm us 3 needles row 1 3 5 7 knit row 2 k1 m1 k14 16 m1 k1 m1 k14 16 m1 k1 row 4 k2 m1 k14 16 m1 k3 m1 k14 16 m1 k2 row 6 k3 m1 k14 16 m1 k5 m1 k14 16 m1 k3 row 8 k4 m1 k14 16 m1 k7 m1 k14 16 m1 k4 row 9-18 knit row 19 k27 29 ssk turn row 20 sl1 p7 p2tog turn row 21 sl1 k7 ssk turn repeat row 20 and 21 6 8 times 34 sts next row sl1 p7 p2tog k to eor 33 sts change to 2 75mm us2 needles row 1 knit row 2 *k1 p1 repeat from * to last st k1 row 3 sl1 *k1 p1 repeat from * to eor row 4 sl1 *p1 k1 repeat from * to last st k1 repeat these last two row 8 10 more times cast off using jeny s surprisingly stretchy bindoff see tutorials on youtube to finish sew up the back and foot seam turn over cuff abbreviations eor end of round k knit m1 insert the right-hand needle tip from front to back under the bar between the stitches and knit it p purl p2tog purl 2 sts together sl1 slip 1 st ssk sl1 k1 pass slipped stitch over st/sts stitch/stitches page 2 ©hushimcounting 2022 find hushimcounting designs at @hushimcounting on instagram at https //www ravelry com/stores/hushimcounting- designs or at https //www lovecrafts com
